banner.opening: In this space, you'll get to know a little about me, check out some of my projects, and see what I've been creating. If you like what you see, let's chat! ðŸ˜‰

about.title: About
about.text1: My career in technology is the result of a recent transition, after 10 years working in the construction industry. This experience gave me valuable skills, such as problem-solving, proactivity and assertive communication, in addition to the maturity to face challenges. These qualities complement my technical skills, making me a well-rounded and adaptable professional.
about.text2: In addition, I am a person with a cheerful personality, enthusiastic about new things and always willing to connect with colleagues, share experiences and exchange knowledge.
about.text3: I began my career as a developer in 2023, at Instituto PrÃ³-Hemo SaÃºde (IPH), where I am rebuilding the institute's website from scratch with Vue.js, SASS and code versioning with Git, resulting in a more modern and responsive layout. I am also developing the new IPH Educa website with the same technologies. I have an affinity for React.js, both in personal projects and in projects developed during the Full-Stack programming course that I completed at Digital College in 2023.
about.text4: I'm excited to expand my experiences, explore new paths and meet incredible people to exchange experiences and share knowledge. If you give me this opportunity, let's build something incredible together!
